settings.heading: QUINTESSENTIAL MEETS CRAFT
settings.description:
Inspired by Via Carota, the award-winning West Village restaurant from Jody Williams and Rita Sodi.

Via Carota is a gathering place for locals and travelers from around the world. From its celebrated Negroni to modern riffs on timeless recipes, Via Carota’s cocktail program is expertly crafted with the finest ingredients.

settings.review: “Wow, tastes just like i’m at a fancy cocktail bar! I love having a few friends over and watching their reaction after they take the first sip.”
settings.name: Eva V.

settings.review: “Every time i’m in NYC I make sure to go for a drink at Via Carota. Now that their cocktails can also come to me is a dream come true.”
settings.name: Erin R.

settings.review: “Hands down the best Negroni I have ever tasted. It’s not too sweet, not too bitter, it’s just right.”
settings.name: Grant F.

settings.review: “This Old Fashioned is next level. I bring a bottle every time I am invited to dinner. I seem to bet getting invited to a lot more dinners lately.”
settings.name: Tigran N.

settings.heading: DRINK WITH US
settings.description: Subscribe to our newsletter to be the first to know about new cocktails, promotions and curated recipes.
